meanings.definition: A person who advocates or practices destruction, especially of property.
meanings.sent1: The destructionist believed in causing harm to buildings.
meanings.sent2: The destructionist vandalized the park benches.
meanings.sent3: The destructionist thought it would be funny to paint graffiti on the walls.
meanings.sent4: Her actions as a destructionist left a trail of chaos in the city.
meanings.sent5: The destructionist's impact on the community was undeniable.

meanings.definition: Causing or tending to cause destruction.
meanings.sent1: The storm had a destructionist effect on the town.
meanings.sent2: The fire was a destructionist force, leaving nothing but ashes.
meanings.sent3: The destructionist winds blew the leaves off the trees.
meanings.sent4: The destructionist nature of the earthquake shook the entire region.
meanings.sent5: The destructionist power of the volcano was awe-inspiring.
